title: Drivers Face Hefty Fines as More School Buses Get Traffic Cameras - The Wall Street Journal
content: Drivers Face Hefty Fines as More School Buses Get Traffic Cameras  The Wall Street Journal
description: Local officials say the purpose of bus-mounted cameras is to change the behavior of drivers who fail to stop when buses load or unload studentsâ€”violations that occur thousands of times a day nationwide and can imperil children.
